useCase.name: Move Specific Data
useCase.description: A Data Steward needs to move specific data.

preconditions.precondition: Data Steward has appropriate permissions to move data.

successEndConditions.condition: The specified data is successfully moved.

useCase.trigger: Data Steward initiates the data move.

mainSequence.step: Common Data Service initiates the process to move data.
Common Data Service successfully moves the specified data.
